mapper.select: SELECT dc.`material_id`, m.`material_name`, dc.`offline_progress`, dc.`online_progress` FROM `declaration` dc LEFT JOIN `material` m ON dc.`material_id` = m.`id` WHERE dc.`material_id` =#{materialId} AND dc.`user_id`=#{userId}

SELECT d.`material_id`, dp1.`textbook_id`,d.online_progress, tb.`textbook_name`,d.`user_id`, dp.`chosen_position`,dp.`rank`, tb.`is_chief_chosen`,tb.`is_published` ,tb.is_locked,m.is_force_end FROM `declaration` d
LEFT JOIN `dec_position` dp1 ON dp1.`declaration_id` = d.`id`
LEFT JOIN `textbook` tb ON tb.`id`= dp1.`textbook_id` LEFT JOIN `dec_position_published` dp ON dp.`declaration_id` = d.`id` and tb.`id`= dp.`textbook_id` LEFT JOIN `material` m ON tb.`material_id` = m.`id` WHERE d.`user_id`=#{userId} AND d.`material_id`=#{materialId} and d.online_progress>0

SELECT d.id, t1.user_id, d.msg_id, d.title, t1.online_progress, t1.gmt_update, d.gmt_create FROM user_message d JOIN declaration t1 ON d.material_id = t1.material_id WHERE t1.material_id = #{materialId} AND d.receiver_id = #{userId} AND t1.user_id = #{userId} order by d.gmt_create desc
SELECT * FROM `declaration` d WHERE d.`is_staging`=0 AND d.`user_id`=#{userId} AND d.`material_id`=#{materialId}
